mapper.select: SELECT se.id, se.username, se.password FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user.username = #{username} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_email_account (id, username, password, domain) VALUES (#{emailAccountId}, #{emailAddress}, #{password}, #{domain})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_user_email WHERE user_id, email_id IN( SELECT sue.user_id, sue.email_id FROM sys_email_account sea, sys_user_email sue WHERE sea.username = #{emailAddress} AND sea.id = sue.email_id AND sue.user_id = #{userId} AND sea.del_flag = '0')
mapper.select: SELECT se.id, se.username, se.password, se.domain FROM sys_user_email sue, sys_email_account se WHERE sue.email_id = se.id AND sue.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
